uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.config

Interface ConfigService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppContextService<ConfigService>, Contexed
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigService, CachedConfigService, DataBaseConfigService, DefaultConfigService, OverrideConfigService, ServletConfigService, ServletContextConfigService

    public interface ConfigService
extends Contexed, AppContextService<ConfigService>
    Interface for configuration service A configurations service is usually a pre-requisite for any other service so these are usually explicitly added to an AppContext when the AppContext is created
    Author:
    spb
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(ConfigServiceListener listener)
      register a ConfigServiceListener
      void clearServiceProperties()
      clear any cached properties.
      java.util.Properties getServiceProperties()
      return the set of properties defined by the service
      void setProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Set a property This method is for making persistent changes to the configuration. if the service is not capable of making persistent changes it should forward the request to a nested service or throw an UnsupportedOperationException

      • Methods inherited from interface uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.AppContextService

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceProperties

        java.util.Properties getServiceProperties()
        return the set of properties defined by the service
        Returns:
        Properties

      • clearServiceProperties

        void clearServiceProperties()
        clear any cached properties. This will cause the properties to be re-read the next time getServiceProperties is called. Implementations are permitted not to cache data in which case this is a No-op.

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String value)
                 throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Set a property This method is for making persistent changes to the configuration. if the service is not capable of making persistent changes it should forward the request to a nested service or throw an UnsupportedOperationException
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Parameters:
        name -
        value -
